org.rcsb.mmtf.dataholders

Class BioAssemblyTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rcsb.mmtf.dataholders.BioAssemblyTransformation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class BioAssemblyTransformation
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The transformation needed for generation of biological assemblies from the contents of a PDB/mmCIF file. It contains both the actual transformation (rotation+translation) and the chain identifier to which it should be applied.
    Author:
    Anthony Bradley
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getMatrix

        public double[] getMatrix()
        Gets the 4x4 matrix transformation specifying a rotation and a translation. Stored linearly in row major order.
        Returns:
        the transformation

      • setMatrix

        public void setMatrix(double[] transformation)
        Sets the 4x4 matrix transformation specifying a rotation and a translation. Stored linearly in row major order.
        Parameters:
        transformation - the new transformation

      • getChainIndexList

        public int[] getChainIndexList()
        Gets the indices of the chains this bioassembly refers to.
        Returns:
        a list of integers indicating the indices (zero indexed) of the chains this bioassembly refers to.

      • setChainIndexList

        public void setChainIndexList(int[] inputChainId)
        Sets the chain id.
        Parameters:
        inputChainId - a list of integers indicating the indices (zero indexed) of the chains this bioassembly refers to.
